modName: 1 level main quest completed Chuck Norris
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][img]http://media.melty.fr/article-1018878-fb/chuck-norris-expendables-3-stallone-nicolas.jpg[/img]Most badass save file ever made.
[/size][size=3]Based on this photo Chuck Norris save file. Hand made, pretty realistic Chuck. I tried to find a exsiting Chuck save file but there was nothing good in my opinion. So i made this great Chuck for my own. Finished main quest, first level for your ultimate sandbox experience with Chuck. All of your equpiment is in the chest. Sorry for my bad English. Feel free to make requests of new save files.

[/size][size=4]Recommended

[/size][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67524/?]SCHWARZENEGGER and Modern Weapons Pack by [b]MJP2008[/b][/url] 
For amazing weapons and well fitting followers

[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20923/?]TK Dodge by [b]tktk[/b][/url]
For comando style badass dodges and rolls

[size=4]Needed[/size]

[size=3]SkyUi and of course SKSE[/size]

[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair by [b]Apachii[/b][/url]
[/size]with apachiiskyhair and apachiiskyhairmale (latest version both)

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu by [b]Expired[/b][/url]

And legal copy of The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim
author: Makserator
